description.value:
The capricious nature of the fey runs in your family due to some intermingling of fey blood or magic. You are more emotional than most, prone to bouts of joy and rage.

Class Skill: Knowledge (nature).

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{Entangle} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{Hideous Laughter} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qgmlu83z2l84kjde]{Deep Slumber} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{Poison} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{Tree Stride} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.446vcsetq4ny904e]{Mislead} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nq4txj4d0dtzscu2]{Phase Door} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{Irresistible Dance} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{Shapechange} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{Mobility},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8rsFtye3PwM6CKli]{Point-Blank Shot},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.53urYIbYYpQuoSLd]{Precise Shot},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{Quicken Spell},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Knowledge [nature]).

Bloodline Arcana: Whenever you cast a spell of the compulsion subschool, increase the spellâ€™s DC by +2.
